      • showData

        public static void showData(java.util.Scanner sc,
                            double totalHC,
                            double totalCentro,
                            double totalBarrio,
                            int quantityMaterials,
                            java.lang.String[] materials,
                            double[] minPrices,
                            java.lang.String[] minStores,
                            double totalCost,
                            java.lang.String[] typeUtilization)
        Shows the data.
        pre: parameters are initialized.
        post:
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner.
        totalHC - Total purchase value HomeCenter
        totalCentro - Total purchase value Ferreteria del Centro.
        totalBarrio - Total purchase value Ferreteria del Barrio.
        quantityMaterials - quantity of input materials. quantityMaterials>0 and quantityMaterials!=null.
        materials - Name of the products to buy. materials!="" and materials!=null.
        minPrices - lowest prices for each material.
        minStores - Stores with the lowest prices.
        totalCost - Total purchase cost
        typeUtilization - Utilization of the material.

      • showMaterials

        public static void showMaterials(java.lang.String[] materials,
                                 java.lang.String[] typeUtilization,
                                 int quantityMaterials,
                                 java.lang.String type)
        Shows the type of material requested.
        pre: The parameters are initialized.
        post:
        Parameters:
        materials - Name of the products.
        typeUtilization - Utilization of the material.
        quantityMaterials - quantity of input materials. quantityMaterials>0 and quantityMaterials!=null.
        type - Type of material requested. type!="" and type!=null
